tooltip.protectit.claim.howto: Place block to highlight the area you wish to claim. Use placed stake to claim the land.
tooltip.protectit.remove_claim.howto:
Place block to highlight your property.
Use placed stake to remove your claimed property and get a claim stake back.
tooltip.protectit.property_lever.howto:
Place lever within your property.
Use placed lever to highlight your land.
tooltip.protectit.subdivide_license.howt: Use license when within the property region to enable subdivisibility.~The property can now be sub-divided using the command /protect block subdivide...
tooltip.protectit.unclaimed_stake.howto: Place block within the highlighted region. Use placed stake to claim the land.
tooltip.protectit.deed.howto: Use deed when within the property region to transfer ownership.
tooltip.protectit.deed.title: Deed To Seller's Property
tooltip.protectit.lease.howto: Use lease when within the property region to transfer ownership.
tooltip.protectit.lease.title: Lease To Landlord's Property
